Package org.omg.dds.core.policy

Interface Ownership

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<Ownership>, DDSObject, QosPolicy, QosPolicy.ForDataReader, QosPolicy.ForDataWriter, QosPolicy.ForTopic, RequestedOffered<Ownership>, Serializable
public interface Ownership extends QosPolicy.ForTopic, QosPolicy.ForDataReader, QosPolicy.ForDataWriter, RequestedOffered<Ownership>
[optional] Specifies whether it is allowed for multiple DataWriters to write the same instance of the data and if so, how these modifications should be arbitrated. Concerns: Topic, DataReader, DataWriter RxO: Yes Changeable: No
